msbt.message: I'll admit itâ€”I'll be sad to leave this island, .But when I think of all the new workout buddies I'm gonna make, I get really pumped!
Don't let your guard down. It doesn't matter what island I'm on, I'm gonna be number one, !
Whew! Not long now before I leave the island.The memories are flooding back Wow, I ran a LOT of laps around this place, !
